oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mârûzât : manuscript, undated
Maʻrūḍāt
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Abū al-Saʻūd Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad , 1492 or 1493-1574 or 1575
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in naskh, in one column, 19 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. First two leaves framed within double black and golden now faded lines. Catchwords embedded in text.
Glazed light-cream laid paper, boards coverd with marbled paper, red leather spine.

With: Dürr-i meknûn (ff. 1v-28r) ; Din ve dünyaya nâfi yirmi üç hikmet (ff. 29v-32r) ; Vasiyet etmek hakkında risale (ff. 34r-37r) ; Kânûnnâme-yi cedide fî-mâ yete'allak bi'l-arâzî (ff. 50r-71v) ; Fetvâlar (ff. 76v-89r) ; Kitāb Jawāhir al-farāʼiḍ (ff. 98v-102v).
MS Turk 11. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islam--Doctrines
Islamic law--Interpretation and construction
Fatwas
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Karateke, Ottoman Turkish manuscripts and documents at Harvard's Houghton Library,
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: أبو السعود، محمد بن محمد، , 1492 or 1493-1574 or 1575
